registryIdentity.name: Open Token Registry
registryIdentity.description: A community-reviewed registry of tokens on Bitcoin Cash. Publishes names, symbols, icons, and other metadata about CashTokens via a Bitcoin Cash Metadata Registry (BCMR).

2023-05-12T20:18:04.000Z.name: OTR Chipnet Tokens
2023-05-12T20:18:04.000Z.description:
OpenTokenRegistry's example fungible token issued on Chipnet, a network used for Bitcoin Cash development.

In user interfaces with limited space, descriptions may be hidden beyond 140 characters or the first newline character; this example allows for testing of hiding and revealing extended descriptions.

2023-05-15T12:00:00.000Z.name: NFTs from Emerald DAO v2.1.0 May 2023 Upgrade Celebration Edition
2023-05-15T12:00:00.000Z.description:
Series of 2000 numbered NFTs minted by Emerald DAO v2.1.0. The user pays 0.1 BCH to mint a NFT which he can then freely transfer or trade.
Starting May 2024, whomever holds the NFT will have the option of burning the NFT to get 0.101 BCH from the DAO.
The additional 0.001 BCH comes from DAO's rewards pool which was seeded by the creator.
This instance of Emerald DAO v2.1.0 was created on Bitcoin Cash May 2023 upgrade day to demonstrate new capabilities enabled by the CashTokens upgrade, and to celebrate the network upgrade event!
